headline: AEROTECH WIDE BASE XY LINEAR MOTOR STAGE
description: XY Configured Wide-Base Linear Motor Stage    Aerotech ALS50075WB/ALS50060
specstable:
Manufacturer Aerotech
Model ALS50075/ALS50060
Configuration X-Y
Total Travel, XYZ X: 30.00 in (762 mm) Y: 24.00 in (610 mm)
Encoder Included YES
Stage Length 48.00 in (1,219 mm)
Stage Width 21.00 in (533 mm)
Table Length 48.00 in (1,219.20 mm)
Table Width 20.00 in (508.00 mm)
Tabletop Height 9.50 in (241.30 mm)
Maximum Payload 298.00 lb (135.17 kg)
Maximum Travel Speed 80.000 in/s (2,032 mm/s)
Motor Drive: Linear Motor
Other Information Dual Linear Motor is high power and cog-free
Stage specs listed above are for the ALS 50075 (xy base):
Specs for the ALS 50060 that differ are as follows:
  • Travel: 24"
  • Linear accuracy: .25 micron
    Aligned XY within 2 arc seconds
Exterior Dimensions
Width 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
Depth 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
Height 9.500 in (24.1 cm)
Weight 555 lb (252 kg)
